branchCategory.name: PSE300, Pressure Sensor Monitor, 1 Screen, Switch and Analog Outputs
branchCategory.description: <p>PSE300 is a pressure sensor monitor with a 3 + 1/2 digit, 2 color display.  This monitor pairs with any PSE sensor, adding functionality similar to an ISE sensor with integrated display.  Instantaneous readings are shown in red or green, or shifted from one to the other to alert reaching a target condition. Two available switch outputs are also indicated with LEDs.  Other functions permit calibration, peak/bottom readings, error indications, key lock, and anti-chatter.  PSE300 models are UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p> <p><span style="color: #ff0000;">The PSE300 legacy sensor monitor has been updated.  Please consider the new PSE300AC.  Improved features include a new 3-screen, 3-color display, front facing M12 connections, selectable NPN/PNP outputs, and an IP65 enclosure rating.</span></p>

breadCrumb.name: PSE300, Pressure Sensor Monitor, 1 Screen, Switch and Analog Outputs
